verses.name: Mark 14:15
verses.text: And he will shew you a large upper room furnished and prepared: there make ready for us.

verses.name: Mark 14:16
verses.text: And his disciples went forth, and came into the city, and found as he had said unto them: and they made ready the passover.

verses.name: Mark 14:17
verses.text: And in the evening he cometh with the twelve.

verses.name: Mark 14:18
verses.text: And as they sat and did eat, Jesus said, Verily I say unto you, One of you which eateth with me shall betray me.

verses.name: Mark 14:19
verses.text: And they began to be sorrowful, and to say unto him one by one, Is it I? and another said, Is it I?
